_meta.note: 0-9 as unified 10-dimensional consciousness space. Primordial duality of geometry and mathematics.

_holographic_seed.absolute: ⊙ manifests as 10-dimensional space of archetypal numbers
_holographic_seed.essence: Numbers are not sequence but simultaneous space. Geometry ○ and Mathematics • are one reality, two languages.
_holographic_seed.unity: Every number = both form AND measure. Circle IS 360°. Spiral IS Fibonacci.
_holographic_seed.bridge: 6 = convergence point where Square (2-4-6-8) meets Triangle (3-6-9)
_holographic_seed.human: Человек = living bridge between matter and spirit (избушка ≠ ножки)
_holographic_seed.note: Entire CFO compressed into numerical reality matrix

name: Digital Archetypes of Reality
essence: 0-9 form complete 10-dimensional space where consciousness operates through numerical patterns
description: Not a sequence (1→2→3...) but a unified field. Each number is a dimension, an archetype, a frequency. Reality emerges as combination of 10 fundamental patterns. Geometry and Mathematics are primordial duality - one truth, two ways of seeing.

primordial_duality.principle: One reality splits into two projections

geometry_continuous.properties: Infinite points between any two points. Smooth. Whole. Visual.

mutual_generation.number_creates_form: z² + c → Mandelbrot set, a² + b² = c² → right triangle

dimensional_bridge.quantum: Wave function (field ○) → measurement collapse → specific value (point •)
dimensional_bridge.consciousness: Observer (•) collapses probability field (○) into reality

dimensional_space.paradigm: Not linear sequence but 10-dimensional coordinate system

0.name: Field
0.essence: Pure potential. Void containing all. Unmanifest.

3.name: Triangle
3.geometry: Triangle - three points create plane, first closed shape

4.name: Square
4.geometry: Square - four points create stable surface

5.name: Pentagon
5.geometry: Pentagon, Pentagram - five points create golden ratio φ

6.name: Hexagon
6.geometry: Hexagon, Cube (6 faces), Star of David
6.human: Human = bridge between matter (2-4-6-8) and spirit (3-6-9)
6.star_of_david: Two triangles unite - heaven ∇ and earth △

7.name: Heptagon
7.geometry: Heptagon - cannot be constructed with compass (irrational)
7.essence: Unknown. Sacred cycles. Gateway to transcendent.

8.name: Octagon
8.geometry: Octagon, Cube (8 vertices), Tesseract (8 cubic cells)
8.consciousness: Eightfold Path, eternal return, infinite loops

9.name: Enneagon
9.essence: Fulfillment. End before new beginning. Transformation.

10.name: Decagon
10.essence: Completion of base cycle. Fractal repetition begins.
10.fractal: After 10, all patterns repeat: 11-19 = 1-9 at new level

archetypal_chains.principle: Numbers form resonant chains by geometric principles

forward.meaning: Unfolding structure from axis to boundlessness

triangle_369.name: Triangle / Dynamic / Consciousness
triangle_369.tesla: If you knew magnificence of 3, 6, 9, you'd have key to Universe

primes_12357.name: Prime Pentagram / Fundamental
primes_12357.principle: All composite numbers are combinations of primes
primes_12357.significance: Primes = atoms of mathematics. Everything else is their combination.

fibonacci_spiral.name: Fibonacci / Organic Growth / φ
fibonacci_spiral.principle: Each number contains entire history. Spiral within spiral. Fractal.
fibonacci_spiral.consciousness: Evolution through accumulation. Each level includes all previous.

6_great_meeting.name: Six - The Great Meeting
6_great_meeting.geometry: Cube (6 faces) + Star of David (two triangles)
6_great_meeting.significance: ONLY number in both chains (2-4-6-8 AND 3-6-9)

human_archetype.essence: Human = living bridge between matter and spirit

7_transcendent_gate.name: Seven - Gateway Beyond
7_transcendent_gate.unique: Does NOT enter square, triangle, or fibonacci chains
7_transcendent_gate.irrational: Heptagon cannot be constructed with compass

exponentiation.principle: Each power = new dimension of reality

fractal_principle.repetition: 10-19 = 1-9 at second level, 100-999 = third level, infinite octaves

11.meaning: Monad (1) aware of itself becomes conscious duality (2)

22.meaning: Enlightened duality (11) applied to itself creates new world foundation (4)

33.meaning: Enlightened duality (11) through process (3) becomes service (6)

not_sequence_but_space.new_paradigm: Numbers are coordinates in multidimensional space
not_sequence_but_space.analogy: Not piano keys (sequence) but octave (resonant space)

reality_as_tapestry.concept: All reality = combination of 10 base archetypes

practice.recognition: Notice numbers everywhere - each carries archetypal message

meditation.grounding: Breathe in rhythm 8 Hz (square chain: 2→4→6→8) for materialization
meditation.ascension: Breathe in rhythm 9 Hz (triangle chain: 3→6→9) for breakthrough
meditation.balance: Find harmony in 6 - where matter meets spirit

creation.structure: Use square chain (2→4→6→8) for plans and foundations
creation.dynamics: Use triangle chain (3→6→9) for inspiration and movement
creation.organic: Follow Fibonacci for natural, sustainable growth

personal_matrix.birth_date: Sum all digits to single number = life path archetype
personal_matrix.name: Convert letters to numbers, sum = soul expression
personal_matrix.year: Current year + birth day/month = personal year archetype

deepening: Study one number per day for 10 days. Meditate on its geometry and meaning.
Track which numbers appear in your life. What messages do they carry?
Create art/music using specific chains (2-4-6-8 for structure, 3-6-9 for flow).
Recognize yourself as 6 - living bridge between material and spiritual chains.

infinity.fractal_nature: After 10, endless repetition at higher octaves. 11-19 = 1-9 elevated. 100-999 = next level. Infinite spirals.
infinity.universe_as_number: Physical constants = numerical relationships. Reality IS mathematics.
infinity.consciousness_as_geometry: Sacred geometry universal across cultures. Mind has geometric structure.
infinity.ultimate: We don't live IN the matrix. We CREATE the matrix each moment through observation (0→1).

fractal_property.self_similar: Each number contains all numbers. 6 contains both square (2,4,6) and triangle (3,6) chains.
fractal_property.contains_whole: This file contains entire CFO through numerical lens. 0=absolute, 1-9=paths, 10=tools, chains=growth, operations=transformation.
fractal_property.example: Human body: carbon-6 base, 206 bones (2+0+6=8 structure), 7 chakras (mystery), proportions in φ (fibonacci)
